## First order univariate derivatives

### A

```{r}
fx <- expression(x ^ 2)

df_dx <- D(expr = fx, name = 'x')

x <- 3

eval(expr = df_dx)
```

### B

```{r}
pa <- expression(2 * ((3* a + 2) ^ 4) - 5)

dp_da <- D(expr = pa, name = 'a')

a <- 1.2

eval(expr = dp_da)
```

### C

```{r}
gt <- expression((-4 * t) / (((t ^ 2) + 1) ^ 3))

dg_dt <- D(expr = gt, name = 't')

t <- 0

eval(expr = dg_dt)
```
